mean_cn: n.放弃宗教信仰，变节，背叛
mean_en: the state of having rejected your religious beliefs or your political party or a cause (often in favor of opposing beliefs or causes)
sentence: The rabbit\u0027s apostasy is about betraying carrot religion and starting to believe in meat instead.
sentence_trans: 这只兔子放弃了胡萝卜教，改信肉教了。
word_etyma: apo离开 ＋ stasy站 → 站开了 → apostasy背教；变节
